title: Brothers font alternative
content:
Hi,

I am looking for other free options of a font like the famous Brothers font.

[https://cdn.myfonts.net/s/aw/200x200/94/0/48359.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153749/https:/cdn.myfonts.net/s/aw/200x200/94/0/48359.png "https://cdn.myfonts.net/s/aw/200x200/94/0/48359.png")

Something like blender

[http://www.fonts101.com/forum/irv63/2012/10/24/blender\_rtkth.gifhttp://w...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153749/http:/www.fonts101.com/forum/irv63/2012/10/24/blender_rtkth.gifhttp:/www.fonts101.com/forum/irv63/2012/10/24/blender_rtkth.gif "http://www.fonts101.com/forum/irv63/2012/10/24/blender\_rtkth.gifhttp://www.fonts101.com/forum/irv63/2012/10/24/blender\_rtkth.gif")

but a little bit classier.

any ideas?

Thanks!
author: Ju22

comments.content:
Ok second link doesn't work, here is blender:

[https://www.fontshop.com/families/blender/buy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153749/https:/www.fontshop.com/families/blender/buy "https://www.fontshop.com/families/blender/buy")
